thread.title: Judge won’t extend order halting Trump immigration ban
thread.title_full: Judge won’t extend order halting Trump immigration ban

title: Judge won’t extend order halting Trump immigration ban
text:
Judge won’t extend order halting Trump immigration ban Judge won’t extend order halting Trump immigration ban Demonstrators at Logan Airport protested against the ban Tuesday. –Aram Boghosian for The Boston Globe By The Boston Globe updated at 6:11 PM 
In a swift decision, a federal judge refused Friday to extend a restraining order in Boston that had halted the implementation of President Trump’s controversial immigration ban. 
US District Judge Nathaniel M. Gorton said in a 21-page order that lawyers with the American Civil Liberties Union have failed to demonstrate the need for an ongoing restraining order. Read the complete story at BostonGlobe.com . Don’t have a Globe subscription? Boston.com readers get a 2-week free trial . Advertisement
